FastX Utilities


# Basic stats


```{ojs}
//|  code-fold: true

invoke = window.__TAURI__.tauri.invoke;
open   = window.__TAURI__.dialog.open;
ask    = window.__TAURI__.dialog.ask;

// use the tauri open to get absolute file paths
async function choosefasta(){
    const selected = open({
        multiple: false,
        filters: [{
            name: 'Fasta',
            extensions: ['fa', 'fasta', 'fna']}]
    });
    return selected
};

async function choosefastq(){
    const selected = open({
        multiple: false,
        filters: [{
            name: 'Fastq',
            extensions: ['fq', 'fastq']}]
    });
    return selected
};

viewof fasta_stats = Inputs.button(
    "Get Fasta Stats", 
    { 
        value: null, 
        reduce: () => choosefasta().then((fname) => invoke("get_seqstats", {filename: fname}).then()) 
    });


fasta_stats

```




# Convert Fastq to Fasta


```{ojs}
//|  code-fold: true


async function launch_conversion(fqname) {
    let fasta_name = fqname.split(".").slice(0, -1).join("/") + "_converted.fasta";
    console.log(fqname);
    console.log(fasta_name);
    invoke("convert_fastq_to_fasta_tauri", {input_path: fqname, output_path: fasta_name})
}



viewof convert_stats = Inputs.button(
    "Convert FastQ to Fasta", 
    { 
        value: null, 
        reduce: () => choosefastq().then((fqname) => launch_conversion(fqname).then())
    })


convert_stats

```
